{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|Regular}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/concepts/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/ranges/concepts|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept bool Regular = Semiregular&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; EqualityComparable&lt;T&gt;;
}}

{{tt|Regular}} 概念指定类型为''常规''，即它为可复制、可默认构造、且可比较相等。表现类似如 {{c|int}} 的内建类型，且能以 {{tt|{{==}}}} 比较的类型满足该概念。
